name: Therify
headline: Inclusive mental healthcare for companies
description: Therify is an inclusive mental health benefit for companies. Through our web platform, employees access culturally responsive therapists, live community sessions, and self-guided content to support their emotional well-being.

founders.name: James Murray, Founder
founders.description: James is co-founder and CEO of Therify. He previously led partnerships with digital news organizations at Facebook and Instagram. Prior to Facebook, he worked on the enterprise sales team at InVision, a venture-backed product design platform.

founders.name: Warren Sadler, Founder
founders.description:
My background is unique as a technical founder as I started my career as a musician and designer. I've worked for large healthcare companies like HCA, consumer companies like Asurion, and working as a consultant with McKinsey. 

My passion is helping individuals find the therapy they need. Having seen what meaningful conversation, self exploration, and self improvement can do to transform lives firsthand, I am deeply committed to make a more resilient, thoughtful, and connected world.

generated_description:
Therify is a New York-based company that aims to revolutionize workplace mental healthcare by providing inclusive support tailored for employees and their families. Founded in 2021 and backed by Y Combinator's Batch S21, Therify offers a web platform that connects users to culturally responsive therapists, live community sessions, and self-guided resources to foster emotional well-being.

The core mission of Therify is straightforward: ensure that mental health care is accessible and effective for everyone in the workplace. Unlike traditional Employee Assistance Programs (EAPs), Therify’s model allows companies to create a customized network of in-network therapists, enhancing not only the accessibility of care but also optimizing costs. 

With just a small team of three, Therify is making significant waves in the mental health tech sector. Their approach boasts impressive statistics: 92% of users report improved mental health outcomes, and the average cost saving per employee using Therify amounts to $1,260. They’ve also garnered partnerships with notable brands like Indeed and Thumbtack, further validating their service's efficacy.

The platform facilitates a seamless experience for employees, connecting them to licensed therapists often within 48 hours, assisting with personalized care navigation, and prioritizing satisfaction through a rigorous vetting process for providers. Their commitment does not stop there—they also provide educational resources through articles and webinars that help cultivate a culture of well-being within organizations.

If you’re exploring ways to enhance employee wellness while managing costs, Therify presents a compelling case. Their focus on personalized, in-network care could very well be the catalyst for a healthier, happier workplace. Interested parties can learn more and schedule demos through their [website](https://www.therify.co/) to see how they can bring Therify's innovative solutions to their organizations.
